revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "[(Column) 22]:;(Mecheir) 17 likewise:;Herakleides, son of Esouris, grandson of Kollouthos, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 16;;Herakleides, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Ptolemais, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Petalos, grandson of Petaus, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 16;;Petheus, son of Didymos, grandson of Maron, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Hatres, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene, drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Harpalos, grandson of Sarapion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Agathos Demon, grandson of Petheus, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4;;Loupos, son of Horos, grandson of Menches, mother Tapapes, drachmas 16;;Horos, son of Anchorymphis, grandson of Horos, mother Achillis, obols 28;;Psenesis, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Psenesis, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 88, obols 28;;(Mecheir) 18 likewise: ;Lucius Longinus Gemellus, for a third of the bath tax for the13th year, additional charges drachmas 28;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tauris, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;in total for the day, drachmas 48 of which for a third of the bath of bath tax drachmas 28;;(Mecheir) 19 likewise;;Anchophis, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Artemas, grandson of Heron, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 12;;Ammonios, son of Ammonios, grandson of Ammonios, mother Tninis, drachmas 4;;Sambas, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Sambas, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Kames, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Ptollion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Ischyras, son of Panesneus, grandson of Ischyras, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petsiris, mother Heros, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, brother with the same mother, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Doras, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Pamonneouis, son of Anchorimphis, grandson of Pamonneouis, mother Didymarion, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Ischyrion, grandson of Pasoknopaios, mother Tepheros, drachmas 4;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Zenas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Petheus, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petheus, mother Segathis, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema, drachmas 12;;Pnepheros, son of Petaus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4."
